How are NWS Heat Products Changing?
The National Weather Service (NWS) is renaming its heat watch and warning
products to improve messaging of these hazards and provide better decision-
making services.
What is new?
The Excessive Heat Watch and Warning will be renamed to the Extreme Heat
Watch and Warning. No changes will be made to Heat Advisory.
Nationwide Implementation in March 2025
